name: Canal Caveira
description:
Canal Caveira is a short puzzle game made in under a week with GB Studio for a university project.

Features

  • Explore the ruins of Alentejo
  • Meet the fallen ones
  • Uncover the ancient mysteries
  • Lots of cheese

Controls

Credits

Cecy (@_excetera) - Backgrounds, Coding

 Francisco (@_seainbetween) - Level Design, Game Design, Narrative

 João (@JoCant6) - Sprites, Animations
